meanings.definition: To make a hissing or sputtering sound
meanings.sent1: The firework fizzles in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The soda can fizzes when opened.
meanings.sent3: The candle fizzles out, leaving a faint smell of smoke.
meanings.sent4: The sparkler fizzles like a tiny dragon breathing its last breath.
meanings.sent5: The match fizzles as it struggles to ignite.

meanings.sent1: The plan fizzles before it even begins.
meanings.sent2: His excitement fizzles when he realizes he forgot his keys.
meanings.sent3: The joke fizzles, leaving an awkward silence in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm fizzles like a deflating balloon.
meanings.sent5: The party fizzles out as guests start to leave.

meanings.sent1: The fizzles of the soda can being opened filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The crackling fire was accompanied by gentle fizzles.
meanings.sent3: The fizzles of the distant fireworks added to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The fizzles of the frying pan signaled that breakfast was ready.
meanings.sent5: The quiet night was interrupted by the sudden fizzles of a distant engine.
